title: 85/551/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 December 1985 approving a modification to the programme for the marketing and processing of potatoes in England and Wales pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the English text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 December 1985
approving a modification to the programme for the marketing and processing of potatoes in England and Wales pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(85/551/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The modification for the potato sector in England and Wales communicated by the Government of the United Kingdom on 17 April 1985 and supplemented on 2 August 1985 pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 December 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 36, 13. 2. 1980, p. 30.
